member.name: M:FlowerStoreAPI.Controllers.FlowersController.GetAllFlowers
member.summary: Gets you a list of all the cars inside a garage. If the garage does not exist, you get a 404. An empty list means "no cars available".
member.param: The unique identifier of the flowers

member.name: M:FlowerStoreAPI.Controllers.FlowersController.CreateFlower(FlowerStoreAPI.Dtos.FlowerDTOS.FlowerCreateDto)
member.summary: Creates a new car inside a garage. A 404 means that the garage with said id does not exist.
member.param: The unique identifier of the garage
